S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4122: ClassCastException in SQLClob when running in soft upgrade mode (10.4.2.0 -> 10.5.1.0). Fixes incorrect positioning of the stream after investigating the stream header (this doesn't fix the ClassCastException). The positioning bug is also only seen when processing streams with a pre 10.5 header, which may happen both in soft upgrade and hard upgraded mode. It will not happen in a newly created 10.5 database.
Patch file: derby-4122-1a-incorrect_stream_positioning.diff
